about.summary: Lp_solve is freely available (under LGPL 2) software for solving linear, integer and mixed integer programs. In this implementation we supply a "wrapper" function in C and some R functions that solve general linear/integer problems, assignment problems, and transportation problems. This version calls lp_solve version 5.5.

name: r-lpsolve
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "5.6.15" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-lpsolve
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/lpSolve_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/lpSolve/lpSolve_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4627be4178abad34fc85a7d264c2eb5e27506f007e46687b0b8a4f8fbdf4f3ba

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('lpSolve')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('lpSolve')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=lpSolve
  license: LGPL-2
  summary: Lp_solve is freely available (under LGPL 2) software for solving linear, integer and
    mixed integer programs. In this implementation we supply a "wrapper" function in
    C and some R functions that solve general linear/integer problems, assignment problems,
    and transportation problems. This version calls lp_solve version 5.5.
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/LGPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: lpSolve
# Version: 5.6.13.3
# Date: 2015-09-18
# Title: Interface to 'Lp_solve' v. 5.5 to Solve Linear/Integer Programs
# Author: Michel Berkelaar and others
# Maintainer: ORPHANED
# Description: Lp_solve is freely available (under LGPL 2) software for solving linear, integer and mixed integer programs. In this implementation we supply a "wrapper" function in C and some R functions that solve general linear/integer problems, assignment problems, and transportation problems. This version calls lp_solve version 5.5.
# License: LGPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: yes
# Packaged: 2019-08-19 06:39:18 UTC; ripley
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-08-19 08:20:05 UTC
# X-CRAN-Original-Maintainer: Samuel E. Buttrey <buttrey@nps.edu>
# X-CRAN-Comment: Orphaned and corrected on 2019-05-28 as check issues were not addressed despite reminder. . gcc 9 warnings
smithy_version:
No azure token. Create a token and
put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
3.7.0
